channel.title: Travel on BlackPirateX
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on BlackPirateX

item.title: Ranchi Experience
item.description: Background This journey was because of NTPC (railway) exam, that happened on 14th August. I went there on 13th and came back home on 15th. Things that I noticed are different. People in Jharkhand eats a lot of Samosa. Specially on train. The price is 10/piece. I bought 4 at Hatia Railway Station. Female Hawkers, There are significant number of female hawkers, way more than that i see in West Bengal.
